sentence.text: For too long the big firms in particular relied on the cosy requirement of a statutory audit to ensure their bread was generously buttered .
My list may include a tomato , a buttered roll , a chunk of moist cheese , a slice of fruit cake , and an orange .
Sliced avocado , mozzarella cheese and tomato , with fresh basil leaves or pesto sauce in lightly buttered soft grain bread .
Press the mix into a buttered timbale mould .
Her supper was on a tray , a plate of yellow buttered eggs , pink rhubarb with cream , a glass of milk and a tiny glass vase of flowers .
A single spoonful of buttered eggs made her feel sick .
We packed some cheese rolls and sardine sandwiches , spring onions and tomatoes , buttered scones and apples and pots of yoghurt .
A boiled egg and two slices of buttered bread had been laid out at his place at the table .
In the tea room , beneath the yellow fleur-de-lys wallpaper , several dozen elderly men munch their way through buttered toast and crumpets .
Arrange the leeks in a buttered ovenproof dish .
Remove from heat , pouring the mixture into a buttered tin .

The wedding breakfast would have a Scottish flavour and the centrepiece would be a proper breakfast dish of kedgeree made with plenty of salmon , generously buttered , flecked with herbs and cucumber .
Spoon the stuffing into the buttered dish , cover tightly with foil and place on the oven shelf below the duck when the temperature is at the reduced setting .
Arrange in a buttered dish and sprinkle the sultanas evenly over the top .
2 Place the fillets in a buttered ovenproof dish and sprinkle with the lemon juice , wine , parsley and seasoning .
A bowl of hot , buttered , boiled potatoes stood in the middle of the table .
The Farewell Tea was spread in Hepzibah 's kitchen : cold chicken and salad , a cheese and onion pie , a big plate of drop scones , thickly buttered .
When ready to serve slice the salmon thinly an serve with buttered rye bread .
Transfer to buttered baking sheets .
Posset was heated milk enriched with eggs , sherry or wine , sugar and nutmeg , and it was sometimes accompanied by hot , buttered sweet buns .
He handed her a plate containing four small triangles of toasted wholemeal bread , sparsely buttered .
